titleStmt.title: The coppy of a letter sent from the Earle of Traquere in Ireland the third of October 1641 To old Father Philips, heere in England, and now prisoner in the Tower. VVhich letter was intercepted, at a certaine time by Sir Robert Richardson, kept private but now disclosed. Vpon which old Father Philips was committed to the Tower. With a true relation how the number of rebels dayly increase in the woods at Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Traquair, John Stewart, Earl of, d. 1659.
